page.title: 12TRAVELLING TO WORK
page.content:
Some of the pupils in our class made a survey of the destinations to which the childrens'parents travel each day for work:-{ {DESTINATION DISTANCE TRANSPORT Tiverton 11 miles Car Local area Varies Council lorry Cullompton 10 miles Bike or lorry Willand 8 miles Bicycle Wellington 6 miles Car Holcombe Rogus 1 mile Moped Honiton 20 miles Car Burlescombe 2 miles Bicycle Bampton 9 miles Van Ilminster 22 miles Car Taunton 14 miles Car
It was interesting to find that the parents of only 5 pupils work in the village:3 are farmers,1 works in the shop,1 runs the public house and none are unemployed.
